accomplishments:
**Driving early alignment for key FORGE decisions**
When the portfolio was spinning without a clear customer or path to outcomes, I stepped up to lead stakeholder conversations with government stakeholders (I was really comfortable navigating these conversations). I became an expert on the current Forge deployment process, mapped where friction existed, and worked with our gov stakeholders that to identify Nova as our pathfinder. This work gave the portfolio direction based on real user pain points, and we're now onboarding Nova and working toward actual outcomes.




**Designed and aligned the portfolio on Forge's complete tenant experience from first contact through first deployment.** 
I led the design work covering account creation, onboarding, environment provisioning, and deployment workflows, using service blueprints, journey maps, and friction logs as tools to facilitate alignment conversations across engineering, PM, and leadership. The result is a cohesive, well-thought-out tenant journey that the entire portfolio understands and is building toward. This experience is already yielding impact, as we're onboarding internal apps in under a week and actively using these workflows to onboard our first external tenant.




**Contributions to Rise8 Culture and Design Practices**
I paired with designers to teach them vibe coding and AI tools. I think theres a world where users get access to impactful UX improvements sooner because designers are able to use tools like Claude Code to commit design cleanups and front-end changes, and I'm really excited to keep helping Rise8 work toward that. Separately, I've been pairing with designers on platform design approaches, helping them see what impact design can have on these teams. I'm extremely passionate about the impact a designer can have on a platform team (I've seen it both on the platform side and on the tenant side) so I'm also eager to continue enabling folks on that front. On FORGE, I'm leading the company's first experiment with a centralized design agency model to sense and respond to tenant needs more effectively. We're documenting lessons learned so other projects can adapt this approach when it makes sense. I also served on Prod Patrol vetting outcomes, ensuring that the company is not only tracking outcomes, but communicating our impact in the most effective way possible.
